info.description: Network monitoring and management platform API.
info.title: SubNetree API

post.description: Authenticate with username and password to receive a JWT token pair.
Revoke a refresh token to end a session.
Disable TOTP-based MFA. Requires a valid TOTP code for confirmation.
Begin TOTP enrollment. Returns the otpauth URL and recovery codes.
Complete login by providing the TOTP code from an authenticator app.
Complete login using a one-time recovery code instead of a TOTP code.
Complete TOTP enrollment by providing a valid code from the authenticator app.
Exchange a valid refresh token for a new token pair (token rotation).
Create the first admin account. Only works when no users exist.

get.description: Returns whether initial admin setup is needed and the server version.
Returns a paginated list of auto-documentation changelog entries with optional filters.
Generates a zip archive containing a Markdown document for every device.
Produces a comprehensive Markdown document for a single device including hardware, services, alerts, and changelog.
Generates a markdown summary of changelog entries for the given time range.
Returns aggregate statistics about the auto-documentation changelog.
Returns the full tool catalog for client-side filtering.
Returns recommended homelab tools filtered by hardware tier and optional category, sorted by memory requirements ascending.

parameters.description: Filter by category (monitoring, infrastructure, dns, etc.)
parameters.name: category

get.description: Returns all registered Scout agents.
Returns a single Scout agent by ID.

delete.description: Removes a Scout agent by ID.

get.description: Returns the stored hardware profile for a specific agent.
Returns the stored services list for a specific agent.
Returns the stored software inventory for a specific agent.
Redirects to the GitHub release download URL for the Scout binary.

post.description: Creates a new enrollment token for agent registration.

get.description: Returns a platform-specific install script (bash or PowerShell) for one-click Scout agent deployment.
Returns the latest Scout binary version and download URLs for all platforms.
Returns service health status with version information.
Returns all detected anomalies across all devices.
Returns anomalies for a specific device.
Returns learned baselines for a specific device.
Returns active alert correlation groups.
Returns alert correlation groups involving a specific device.
Returns capacity forecasts for a specific device.

post.description: Translate a natural language question into a structured query and return results.

get.description: Returns optimization recommendations based on recent metrics.
Returns the current LLM provider configuration.

put.description: Update the LLM provider and model configuration.

post.description: Tests connectivity to the configured LLM provider.

get.description: Returns paginated MCP tool call audit entries
Returns all registered plugins with their metadata.
Returns monitoring alerts with optional filters.
Returns active alerts grouped by topology correlation. Parent alerts include their suppressed children.
Returns a single monitoring alert by ID.

post.description: Marks an alert as acknowledged.
Marks an alert as resolved.

get.description: Returns all monitoring checks (enabled and disabled).

post.description: Creates a new monitoring check for a device.

get.description: Returns all upstream device dependencies for a check.

post.description: Adds an upstream device dependency. When the upstream device has an active critical alert, this check's alerts are suppressed.

delete.description: Removes an upstream device dependency from a check.

get.description: Returns monitoring checks for a specific device.

put.description: Updates fields on an existing monitoring check.

delete.description: Deletes a monitoring check and cascade-deletes its results.

patch.description: Toggles the enabled/disabled state of a monitoring check.

get.description: Returns time-series metrics for a device with automatic downsampling.
Returns all notification channels with sensitive fields masked.

post.description: Creates a new notification channel (webhook or email).

get.description: Returns a single notification channel by ID with sensitive fields masked.

put.description: Updates fields on an existing notification channel.

delete.description: Deletes a notification channel by ID.

post.description: Sends a test notification through the specified channel.

get.description: Returns recent check results for a specific device.
Returns composite health status for a specific device, including latest check result and active alerts.
Returns a paginated list of devices with optional status, type, category, and owner filters.

post.description: Manually creates a new device record.

patch.description: Applies the same partial update to multiple devices by ID.

parameters.description: Device IDs and fields to update
parameters.name: request

get.description: Downloads all devices in CSV format for spreadsheet import or backup.

post.description: Uploads a CSV file to create or update devices. Duplicates detected by MAC address or hostname.

get.description: Returns devices matching hardware filters like RAM, CPU model, OS, platform type, and GPU.
Returns a single device by its ID.

put.description: Partially updates a device's notes, tags, custom fields, or device type.

delete.description: Permanently removes a device and its history.

get.description: Returns all GPUs installed in a device.
Returns the full hardware profile including storage, GPUs, and services for a device.

put.description: Manually creates or updates a device's hardware profile. Sets collection_source to "manual".

post.description: Triggers a hardware profile re-collection for a device. For agent-managed devices, publishes a refresh event to the dispatch system.

get.description: Returns the status change timeline for a device.
Returns scans that discovered or updated the specified device.
Returns all running services on a device.
Returns all storage devices attached to a device.

post.description: Performs a reverse DNS lookup for IP addresses or forward lookup for hostnames
Sends ICMP echo requests to the target and returns RTT statistics
Tests TCP connectivity to specified ports on the target host, with optional banner grabbing

get.description: Returns all devices organized in a parent-child hierarchy with network layers
Returns aggregate hardware statistics across all devices with hardware profiles.
Returns aggregate device inventory statistics including counts by status, category, and type.

parameters.description: Days since last seen to consider stale
parameters.name: stale_days

get.description: Returns weekly or monthly aggregates of scan performance metrics.
Returns a 0-100 health score based on scan success rate, duration stability, device count stability, and other factors.
Returns recent individual scan performance metrics.
Returns recent service movements where a port migrated from one device to another.

post.description: Connects to a Proxmox VE host, enumerates VMs and containers, and syncs them as child devices with resource snapshots.

get.description: Returns all Proxmox-managed VMs and containers with their latest resource snapshots.

parameters.description: Filter by parent host device ID
parameters.name: parent_id

get.description: Returns the latest resource snapshot for a specific Proxmox VM or container.

post.description: Trigger a new network scan on the given subnet. Returns immediately with scan ID.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of scan results.
Returns a single scan result including discovered devices.

post.description: Discover a device via SNMP using the given credentials.

get.description: Query SNMP interface table from a device.
Query SNMP system information from a device.
Returns the network topology as a graph of nodes and edges.
Returns all saved topology layout configurations.

post.description: Creates a new saved topology layout configuration.

put.description: Updates an existing saved topology layout configuration.

delete.description: Deletes a saved topology layout configuration.

post.description: Performs an ICMP traceroute to the specified target IP address

get.description: Returns devices connected to the server's WiFi AP/hotspot with signal data
Get a list of all network interfaces available on the server.
Get the currently configured network interface for scanning.

post.description: Configure which network interface to use for scanning.

400.description: Invalid request or interface not found

get.description: Get all available themes (built-in and custom).

post.description: Create a new custom theme with CSS token overrides.

parameters.description: Theme definition (id, created_at, updated_at, version, built_in are ignored)
parameters.name: request

get.description: Get the ID of the currently active theme.

put.description: Set which theme is currently active.

get.description: Get a theme by its ID.

put.description: Update a custom theme. Built-in themes cannot be modified.

delete.description: Delete a custom theme. Built-in themes cannot be deleted.

get.description: Returns all tracked services for a specific device.
Returns resource utilization summary and grade for a device.
Returns all tracked services with optional filtering.
Returns a single tracked service by ID.

patch.description: Updates the desired operational state for a service.

get.description: Returns fleet-wide utilization summary with grade distribution.
Returns whether the integration is enabled, last sync time and result.

post.description: Immediately syncs devices from the configured Tailscale tailnet.

get.description: Returns all user accounts. Requires admin role.
Returns a single user by ID. Requires admin role.

put.description: Update a user's email, role, or disabled status. Requires admin role.

delete.description: Delete a user account by ID. Requires admin role.

classification_confidence.description: Classification metadata from the composite classifier.

parent_device_id.description: Network hierarchy metadata from hierarchy inference.

internal_settings.ActiveThemeRequest.description: Request body for setting the active theme.

internal_settings.ActiveThemeResponse.description: Response containing the active theme ID.

internal_settings.ScanInterfaceRequest.description: Request body for setting the network scan interface.

internal_settings.ScanInterfaceResponse.description: Response containing the configured scan interface.

internal_settings.ThemeDefinition.description: A theme with metadata, layer declarations, and CSS token overrides.

internal_settings.ThemeTokens.description: Customizable CSS design token overrides grouped by UI category.
